item.title: RT Mario Nawfal：凯文·麦卡锡（Kevin McCarthy）：埃隆（Elon）使美国变得更强大：“我认为民主党人甚至没有比...更糟糕的消息传递...
item.description: RT Mario NawfalKEVIN MCCARTHY: ELON IS MAKING AMERICA STRONGER“I did not think it was possible for the Democrats to even get worse messaging than when they attacked the cuts at USAID on the transgender operas in other countries. But now they want to attack Elon while they drive his Teslas.<video controls =“控制”高=“ 1080” poster =“ https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895413524890873856/pu/img/img/o5zbxwdrixjz766ty.jpg src =“ https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1895413524890873856/pu/vid/vid/avc1/1280x720/vtem0jpmpmps_hvgoz.mp4?mp4?tag agg =”

item.title: 我的猜测是@cenkuygur，他做到了，但是如果警卫在那里或相机功能正常，自杀将被停止。
item.description: 我的猜测是@cenkuygur，他做到了，但是如果警卫在那里或相机实用，自杀将被停止，因此可能得到了帮助。 ，他可能已经承诺要换取一些东西以换取自杀。这就是我很好奇的。
